name: Mice and Mechs
description:
Made for MechJam

The ground quakes,

A serrated groan in the distance,

Trouble on the horizon...

lol ur a mouse and u jump around on a mech while it shoots missiles everywhere, have fun and try not to explode!

I made the vast majority of this game, save a couple stock textures + sfx -- I think i need a break from solo jams though @_@ wearing a lot of hats is fun but that many hats gives you a headache.
